TunableVariant.name: carry_track_override
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify which carry track the Sim must use to carry the created object.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: Which hand to carry the object in.

Tunable.name: continuation
Tunable.description: An interaction to push as a continuation to the carry.

TunableVariant.name: continuation_with_affordance_overrides
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows you to specify a continuation to the carry based on a participant's object definition. This continuation will be pushed in addition to the tunable continuation, although you will rarely need to tune both at the same time.

TunableList.name: affordance_override
TunableList.description: Based on the participants's object definition, you can override the affordance on the tunable continuation.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The object definition to look for.

TunableList.name: continuation
TunableList.description: A tunable continuation to push based on the parameters provided.

TunableEnum.name: actor
TunableEnum.description: The Sim on which the affordance is pushed.

Tunable.name: affordance
Tunable.description: The affordance to push as a continuation on the specified actor Sim.

TunableVariant.name: carry_target
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify a carry target for this continuation.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The participant the affordance will set as a carry target.

TunableVariant.name: inventory_carry_target
TunableVariant.description: Item in inventory (of continuations actor) to use as carry target for continuation if carry target is None

Tunable.name: definition
Tunable.description: The base definition to look for inside inventory. Objects that redirect (like counters) will match if base definition is the same.

Tunable.name: definition
Tunable.description: The exact object definition to look for inside inventory.

TunableTuple.name: object_with_tag
TunableTuple.description: This option tests crafted item's tags against a list of possible tags

TunableList.name: tag_set
TunableList.description: The tag of objects we want to test ownership of

TunableEnum.name: test_type
TunableEnum.description: How to test the tags in the tag set against the objects on the lot.

Tunable.name: preserve_preferred_object
Tunable.description: If checked, the pushed interaction's preferred objects are determined by the current preferred objects. If unchecked, the transition sequence would not award bonuses to any specific part.

Tunable.name: preserve_target_part
Tunable.description: If checked, the pushed interaction will use the same target part if applicable. Defaults to false because typically we will want to let the transition select which part to use.

Tunable.name: si_affordance_override
Tunable.description: When the tuned affordance is a mixer for a different SI, use this to specify the mixer's appropriate SI. This is useful for pushing socials.

TunableEnum.name: target
TunableEnum.description: The participant the affordance will target.

TunableEnum.name: participant
TunableEnum.description: When using the affordance_override mapping, this is the participant we will use to get the definition.

TunableVariant.name: definition
TunableVariant.description: The object to create; this can be set at runtime. If 'runtime parameter' is chosen, it will look at the parameter passed in at runtime to determine which object to create. The primary use of the 'runtime parameter' option is if the interaction is pushed from code so consult a GPE before using it.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet. ORs of ANDs

TunableVariant.name: enter_carry_immediately
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, we are gonna run this element immediately without waiting for the 700 XEvt. No continuation affordance should be tuned to this interaction if enter_carry_immediately is enabled, as the owning affordance will act as the tuned continuation.

Tunable.name: owning_affordance
Tunable.description: The interaction that will be pushed that will own the carry state (e.g. a put down).

Tunable.name: parenting_joint
Tunable.description: The joint of the carrier sim to parent the carryable to.

TunableList.name: initial_states
TunableList.description: A list of states to apply to the finished object as soon as it is created.
